#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define cout2(x, y) cout << x << " " << y <<  endl
#define N 1000004
#define K 131

using namespace std;

char s[N];
int k, n;

typedef unsigned long long hash;
hash H[N], PO[N];

hash getHash(int p1, int p2){ return H[p2] - H[p1] * PO[p2 - p1]; }
	
bool puedo(int len){
	
	int ct = 0;
	hash h = getHash(0, len);
	
	for(int i = 0; i + len <= n; i++)
		if(getHash(i, i + len) == h)ct++;
	
	return ct >= k;
}


int main(){
	
	PO[0] = 1;
	for(int i = 1; i < N; i++)PO[i] = PO[i - 1] * K;
	
	while(cin>>n){
		
		scanf("%s%d", s, &k);
		
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			H[i] = H[i - 1] * K + s[i - 1];
		
		int lo = 0, hi = n, me;
		while(lo < hi){
			
			me = lo + (hi - lo + 1)/2;
			if(puedo(me))lo = me;
			else hi = me - 1;
		}
	
		cout << lo << endl;
		for(int i = 0; i < lo; i++)putchar(s[i]);
		puts("");
	}

}
